topics.title: Mitundu ya Mawu m’Chichewa (Parts of Speech)

subsections.title: Mitundu ya Mawu
subsections.content: Zimaphatikizapo dzina, mneni, mlowam’malo, mfotokozi, muonjezi, mvekero, mfuwu, mlumikizi, ndi mperekezi.
points: Dzina (Noun): Ufulu wotere umaputsitsa; Ana inu khalani pansi.
Mneni (Verb): Ufulu wotere umaputsitsa; Ana inu khalani pansi.
Mlowam’malo (Pronoun): Awa ndi anga; Yake yalowa pa dzenje.
Mfotokozi (Adjective): Mbewa yake yalowa pa dzenje; Ana anu ndi okongola.
Muonjezi (Adverb): Inu, khalani pansi; Iwo abwera mawa.
Mvekero (Onomatopoeia): Mbuzi zangoti balala ku dambo; Anthu adali yakaliyakali wa ku msika.
Mfuwu (Interjection): Hede! Zotseketsa odwala; Sha! Usabwerenso kuno.
Mlumikizi (Conjunction): Ndikwatira chifukwa ndakula; Joni ndi Mary apita mawa.
Mperekezi (Preposition): Inu mupite pa denge; Iye adali jijirijijiri kuseri kwa chimbuzi.

subsections.title: Ntchito pa Mitundu ya Mawu
subsections.content: Tchulani mitundu ya mawu omwe atsekedwa mzere pansipa m’ziganizo.

subsections.title: Zigawo za Mawu
subsections.content: Zigawo za mawu ndi mphatikiram’mbuyo, tsinde, ndi mphatikiram’tsogolo.

subsections.title: Kupeza Zigawo za Mawu
subsections.content: Adaweranso zigawo za mawu pamene ali:

subsections.title: Ntchito pa Kupeza Zigawo za Mawu
subsections.content: Pezani zigawo za mawu awa:

subsections.title: Mawu ndi Maphatikizo
subsections.content: Mawu ali ndi maphatikizo osiyanasiyana, kuyambira limodzi mpaka kupitirira.
points: Mawu a phatikizo limodzi: E!, Sha!
Mawu a maphatikizo awiri: Mu-nthu, Ana
Mawu a maphatikizo atatu: A-ta-te, Abambo
Mawu a maphatikizo anayi: Wa-ka-zi-nga, Wagumula
Mawu a maphatikizo asanu: A-dza-li-ma-nso, Asakupatse
Mawu a maphatikizo asanu ndi amodzi kapena kupitirira apo: Wa-zi-bu-lu-bu-di-ra, Adalongosola

subsections.title: Ntchito pa Maphatikizo
subsections.content: Kodi mawu otsatirawa ali ndi maphatikizo angati?

subsections.title: Mitundu ya Aphatikiri
subsections.content: Aphatikiram’mbuyo ndi aphatikiram’tsogolo.

subsections.title: Ntchito pa Aphatikiram’tsogolo
subsections.content: Sankhani mawu omwe ndi aphatikiram’tsogolo mwa mawu otsatirawa:

subsections.title: Mitundu ya Aphatikiram’mbuyo
subsections.content: Aphatikiram’mbuyo amagwiritsidwa ntchito kupanga mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya mawu komanso kuchititsa kusintha kwa mawu ena.
points: Aphatikiram’mbuyo othandiza kupanga mayina: Munthu, Mtengo (mosachulukitsa), Mitengo (mochulukitsa), Anthu.
Aphatikiram’mbuyo othandiza kupanga mitundu ina ya mawu ndi mawu ena osiyanasiyana:
- Mawu oloza/ osonyeza malo: paja, apo
Aphatikiram’mbuyo okulitsa kapena kunyoza: Chikabudula, Chimunthu.
Mphatikiram’kati wapokhapokha: Achibwera bwanayo, tikanalipidwa; Atabwera ndingasangalare; Ndisangalala akabwera.
Aphatikiram’mbuyo osonyeza malo: Kusukulu, Pamunda, M’khola.

subsections.title: Ntchito
subsections.content: Perekani mitundu ya aphatikiram’mbuyo omwe atsekedwa mzere kunsi kwawo mu mawu awa:

subsections.title: Ntchito Zina za Aphatikiram’mbuyo
subsections.content: Aphatikiram’mbuyo amathandiza kusonyeza zinthu zosiyanasiyana monga kupanga chinthu popanda chifukwa chenicheni, kutheka kapena kusatheka kwa chinthu, kugwirizanitsa mchitantchito, ndi zina.
points: Kusonyeza kupanga chinthu popanda chifukwa chenicheni (wopatula): Ine ndangokhala; Atofuna ukwati.
Kusonyeza kutheka/ kusatheka kwa chinthu: Pumbwa sangathe kulima mundawu yekha; Gondoline angadye yekha nsimayi.
Kusonyeza yemwe wachita ntchito (kugwirizanitsa mchitantchito): Ine ndibwera mawa; Mnyamata wagula buku; Mwana wanu wadya nsima yonse.
Kusonyeza yemwe ntchito yamchitikira: Nkhokwezo zidamangidwa pamtunda; Inu mwamenyedwa lero.
Kugwirizanitsa mchitidwantchito/ pamtherankhani: Gabadinho adamulowetsa timu ya Bid Bullets adakali wachichepere; Iwo andibera ndalama yanga; Gondoline wawadyera atsikana nsima yawo.

subsections.title: Ntchito
subsections.content: Pangani ziganizo zomveka bwino ndikugwiritsa ntchito aphatikiram’mbuyo ndi aphatikiramtsogolo.

subsections.title: Ntchito yowunikira
subsections.content: Kodi aphatikiram’mbuyo omwe atsekedwa mzere pansipa akugwira ntchito yanji?

topics.title: Mitundu ya Masinde ndi Ntchito za Aphatikiram’tsogolo

subsections.title: Mitundu ya Masinde
subsections.content: Masinde ndi zigawo za mawu zomwe zimathandiza kutsimikizira mtundu wa mawu monga dzina, umwini, mfotokozi, ndi zina.
points: Tsinde la mfotokozi: Chachiwisi, Wamng’ono, Lalifupi, Wamtali
Tsinde losonyeza malo: Muno, Pamwamba, Kunsi, Kumbuyo
Tsinde lolozera (la mlozi): Uyu, Kaja, Uko
Tsinde lamgwirizano: Zotere, Zonse, Yemwe, Chomwe
Tsinde la mneni: Wayenda, Unditule, Adavina
Tsinde lofunsira: Zingati?, Kuti?, Mwatani?, Chayani?
Tsinde lopatula: Ena, Wekha, Ochepa, Zokha
Tsinde losonyeza kusasiyako kanthu: Tengani zonse, Apita onse kumadzi
Tsinde lakuchuluka kapena kuchepetsa: Zambiri, Ochepa, Zochuluka

subsections.title: Ntchito
subsections.content: Tchulani mitundu ya masinde mu mawu awa:

subsections.title: Mitundu ndi Ntchito za Aphatikiram’tsogolo
subsections.content: Aphatikiram’tsogolo amagwiritsa ntchito kusonyeza zinthu zosiyanasiyana monga kutsimikiza, kufunsa, kuchita zinthu mokakamira, kupitirira, kubwereza, kupempha, ndi zina.
points: - Apa ndiye waavaliratu ndi kwa mawa komwe

subsections.title: Ntchito
subsections.content: Kodi aphatikiramtsogolo omwe ali ndimzere kunsi kwawo mu ziganizo zotsatirazi akugwira ntchito zanji?

topics.title: Ntchito za Mayina ndi Chachimuna ndi Chachikazi

subsections.title: Ntchito za Mayina
subsections.content: Mitundu ya ntchito za mayina ndi njira zomwe mayina amagwirira ntchito m’ziganizo ndi m’malemba.
points: c. Kodi iwe ungamuchapire John zovala?
Kukhala pamtherankhani wopanda chindunji (mlandira kanthu kapena mchitiridwa ntchito):
a. Mwana waphera atate ake bakha
c. Kodi iwe ungamuchapire John zovala?
Kukhala mtsirizitsi (Amatsiriza tanthauzo la mneni: si, -li, ndi, –khala):
b. Bele la Mary ndi lokhakhala
Kukhala dzina lapadera ku dzina linzake/lina:
a. Noel, namwino, wapita ku Mzimba

subsections.title: Ntchito
subsections.content: Tsekani mzere kunsi kwa mayina ndipo mupereke ntchito zake:

subsections.title: Mitundu ya Myina
subsections.content: Mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya myina yomwe imapezeka mu Chichewa.
points: b. Ife twona mavuto ambiri mu moyo wathu
a. Ili ndi gulu la anthu
c. Mulu wa mtedza uli pa k100
d. Mpingo, khamu, mkoko, phava, msonkhano

subsections.title: Ntchito
subsections.content: Tsekani mzere kunsi kwa mayina ndipo tchilani mitundu yake:

subsections.title: Chachimuna ndi Chachikazi
subsections.content: Mitundu ya mayina a amuna ndi akazi m’magulu osiyanasiyana.
points: D. Mayina Osasintha Chachimuna kapena Chachikazi:

subsections.title: Chachimuna ndi Chachikazi (Mwatsatanetsatane)
subsections.content: Mitundu ya mayina a chachimuna ndi chachikazi m’magulu osiyanasiyana.

subsections.title: Mu-, A-
subsections.content: Amagwirizana ndi mawu akuti mmodzi uyu (chimodzi) ndi ambiri awa (zambiri). Amakhala ndi mayina a nyama, anthu, ziwongo ndi mitundu ya anthu.

subsections.title: Mu-, Mi-
subsections.content: Amagwirizana ndi umodzi uwu (chimodzi) ndi yambiri iyi (zambiri). Mayina amayamba ndi mu- kapena m- (chimodzi) ndi mi- (zambiri).

subsections.title: Li-, Ma-
subsections.content: Amagwirizana ndi limodzi ili (chimodzi) ndi ambiri awa (zambiri). Mayina ambiri amayamba ndi li- kapena l- (chimodzi) ndi ma- (zambiri).

subsections.title: Chi-, Zi-
subsections.content: Amagwirizana ndi chimodzi ichi (chimodzi) ndi zambiri izi (zambiri). Mayina amayamba ndi chi- (chimodzi) ndi zi- (zambiri), ngakhale ena sasintha.
points: Mayina monga chimanga, chimwemwe, chikondwerero nthawi zambiri sasintha

subsections.title: I-, Zi-
subsections.content: Amagwirizana ndi imodzi iyi (chimodzi) ndi zambiri izi (zambiri). Mayina sawonetsa kuchuluka kapena kulemekezeka kwa chimodzi kapena zambiri.

subsections.title: U-, Ma-
subsections.content: Amagwirizana ndi uwu (chimodzi) ndi awa (zambiri). Mayina amayamba ndi u- (chimodzi) ndi ma- (zambiri), ngakhale ena sasintha.

subsections.title: Ka-, Ti-
subsections.content: Amagwirizana ndi kamodzi aka (chimodzi) ndi tambiri iti (zambiri). Mayina amayamba ndi ka- (chimodzi) ndi ti- (zambiri).

subsections.title: Ku- + Mneni
subsections.content: Mayina apangidwa pochita mphatikizira ku- ku mneni, ngati gerund mu Chingerezi.

subsections.title: Ku-, Pa-, Mu-
subsections.content: Mayina apangidwa pochita mphatikizira ku-, pa-, m- kapena mu- ku dzina la malo.

subsections.title: Tanthauzo
subsections.content: Nthano ndi nkhani zokambirana zosungidwa kuchokera kwa akulu.
points: Zimatengera nthawi yakale komanso zimapatsidwa kuchokera m’mbadwo kupita m’mbadwo.
Nthano zimathandiza kusunga chikhalidwe ndi chiphunzitso.

subsections.title: Mbali Za Nthano
subsections.content: Nthano zimakhala ndi mbali zomwe zimadziwika bwino.
points: Zimagwiritsa ntchito nyama kapena anthu ngati otchulidwa.
Zili ndi phunziro kapena chitsanzo chomwe ophunzira angaphunzire.
Nthano nthawi zina zimakhala ndi chiyambi kapena kumaliza kwa mawu apadera.
